summary:
Nimble executive Leader with 25 years of international experience in both operational and strategical roles, in Automotive, Energy and Chemistry industries on regional and worldwide scopes. Successfully achieved business transformations including cross-border restructuring pre- and  post- M&A transactions. Worked and lived in France, Spain, UK, Germany, Slovakia, India, China, and currently based in the Netherlands – speaks French, English and Spanish languages, basic Dutch and Italian.
With a mix of business assignments and HR leadership positions, I believe in coaching and empowering people, I make strategic choices and I build relevant capabilities across the organizations. Drive for clarity and simplify complexity to essentials. Recognized high level of energy and strong focus on delivering results adopting a pragmatic approach and stimulating out-of-the-box thinking. 
I'm passionate about being fully involved in designing and achieving the business goals and giving employees and leaders the opportunity to become the best they can be.
Functional expertise:
-	Organization design and culture transformation
-	Operational leadership
-	Business partnering 
-	Coaching for performance and productivity
-      Global transformation program leadership
